titles: Cabala, or, The mystery of conventicles unvail'd in an historical account of the principles and practices of the nonconformists, against church and state : from the first reformation under King Edward the VI. anno 1558. to this present year, 1664 : with an appendix of an CXX. plots against the present govenment, that have been defeated / by Oliver Foulis ...
author: Lloyd, David, 1635-1692.
notes: Attributed to David Lloyd.  Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in National Library of Scotland (Advocates').
keywords: Dissenters, Religious --  England --  Early works to 1800.
